statements: SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_date, order_amount, order_status FROM SalesData WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT order_amount, customer_id, order_status FROM SalesData WHERE order_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, order_status FROM SalesData WHERE customer_id = 5 OR product_id = 8;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE order_status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT order_amount AS total_amount, order_date FROM SalesData WHERE order_amount < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE order_id > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_amount FROM SalesData WHERE order_status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY order_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(order_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 5000;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(order_amount) AS avg_order_amount FROM SalesData WHERE order_status = 'Delivered' GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_order_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_value FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_value < 5000 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sales_date ASC
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY sales_date DESC
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY product_name ASC

SELECT product_name, forecast_value, forecast_date FROM sales_data INNER JOIN demand_forecast ON sales_data.product_id=demand_forecast.product_id WHERE sales_amount > forecast_value ORDER BY forecast_date DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customer_data ORDER BY country, city;
SELECT sale_id, product_name FROM sales_data
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_data ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customer_data WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM SalesData
SELECT customer_id, sale_date, quantity, price FROM SalesData
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM ProductCatalog
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerData WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, SUM(price*quantity) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 1000
SELECT pc.product_name, SUM(sd.quantity) AS total_sold FROM ProductCatalog pc INNER JOIN SalesData sd ON pc.product_id = sd.product_id GROUP BY pc.product_name ORDER BY total_sold DESC

SELECT cd.customer_name, cd.email, dc.forecast_date, pc.product_name, df.expected_demand FROM CustomerData cd, DemandForecast df, ProductCatalog pc WHERE cd.customer_id = df.forecast_id AND df.product_id = pc.product_id

SELECT pd.product_name, AVG(pc.price) AS average_price FROM ProductCatalog pc INNER JOIN SalesData sd ON pc.product_id = sd.product_id INNER JOIN ProductCatalog pd ON sd.product_id = pd.product_id GROUP BY pd.product_name ORDER BY average_price DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_name, order_date, order_quantity FROM SalesData ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY order_date DESC, unit_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, product_category, SUM(order_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_name, product_category ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Orders.order_date, Products.product_name FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id INNER JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Customers.customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND Orders.order_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name, supplier_email, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name, supplier_email ORDER BY total_products DESC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_address, SUM(order_quantity * unit_price) AS total_sales FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, customer_address ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
